title: 我的世界1.11summon问题
author: 陈筱峰

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
因为你用了中文逗号= =
/summon pig ~ ~1 ~ {Rotation:[180.0f,0.0f],CustomName:筱働,CustomNameVisible:1b}

replies.author: 陈筱峰
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2017-8-13 19:05
因为你用了中文逗号= =
/summon pig ~ ~1 ~ {Rotation:[180.0f,0.0f],CustomName:筱働,CustomNameVisible:1 ...
那再追问一下owo/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{},{},{id:observer,Count:1}]}这个是出了什么错误= =
